sentences.english: Adorning the Jin Dashan of milistary exploit chapter is demobilized from army before the bosom, returned home town.
sentences.chinese: 胸前佩戴着軍功章的金大山從部隊復員，回到了家鄉。

sentences.english: Therefore he wanted to suicide while he was wearing his military uniform which was full of military medals on the chest.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他想在穿戴好胸前掛滿了軍功章的軍服時自殺。

sentences.english: The soldier was awarded three campaign medals for bravery.
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵因勇敢而被授予三枚軍功章。
